metadata.title: CVE-2014-7830 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in mod/feedback/mapcourse.php inthe Feedback module in Moodle through 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.9, 2.6.xbefore 2.6.6, and 2.7.x before 2.7.3 allows remote authenticated users toinject arbitrary web script or HTML by leveraging themod/feedback:mapcourse capability to provide a searchcourse parameter.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
